resources.string: Welcome to the Asset Issuer Community.

This application will help you discover and connect to Asset Issuers registered in our network.!

If you are identified as a Redeem Point, you will need to connect to Assets Issuers in order to get approval to redeem assets created by that Asset Issuer.

Select any available Asset Issuer and click connect to start the process. If your network speed is low, you may have to retry several times.
Welcome to the settings notification screen.
Here you can edit your notification settings configurations.
